name: Mawn
description:
Nikki wakes up in the middle of the night for a sip but she notices something strange going on in her house. Join Nikki and find out together!

CONTROLS:
  • Movement - WASD + Mouse or L-Stick for movement and R-stick for rotation
  • Interaction - E or R2/RT on Gamepad
  • Zoom - Z or L2/LT (hold) on Gamepad
  • Look behind - Spacebar or X/A on Gamepad
NOTE FROM DEVS:

We're a small group of friends with this as our first stepping stone into making our own indie games for sheer fun of making games and distributing it with fellow gamers.
If you have played the game, your feedbacks will help us make better and more fun stuff for you! :)
So please feel free to leave suggestions and improvements we can make, after you have tried our game!
Thank you:)
